channel.title: Models on Dynamic Simulation Environment

item.title: Model - CSV
item.description: Synposis A model for setting simulation signals with values read from a CSV file. Model Structure examples/csv └── sim ├── data │ └── simulation.yml └── model └── input └── lib/libcsv.so └── data └── model.yml └── valueset.csv <-- CSV File. CSV File Timestamp;A;B;C 0.0000;1.0;2.0;3.0 0.0005;-1.1;2.1;3.1 0.0010;1.2;-2.2;3.2 0.0015;1.3;2.3;-3.3 Examples Simulation / DSE Script {{ readFile "script.md" chomp }} Simulation / Stack {{ readFile "stack.md" chomp }}
